casebody.data:
HOUSING AUTHORITY
v.
CREECH. No. 114P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Robert Spence, Jr., Smithfield, for Smithfield Housing Authority.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of March 2007 by Defendant for "Petition for Relief":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
